extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Physical Access to CODESYS Key
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that physical access to the CODESYS Key is only granted to authorized personnel to reduce the attack surface.

extracted_playbook.title: Update CODESYS Key Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Update the CODESYS Key firmware to version 4.52 to mitigate the vulnerability and protect future usage of additional features.

extracted_playbook.title: Install Firmware Update via CodeMeter Control Center
extracted_playbook.description: Use the CodeMeter Control Center to install the firmware update for the CODESYS Key.
